name: Fast Fluid Simulation - GLSL Setup

git.message: do not show "automated error report" to admin users - pandrr/cables/issues/4193

description:
This is a Fast Fluid Simulation setup based on this AMAZING TouchDesigner Tutorial by Bruno Imbrizi: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2k6H5Qa_fCE

The Simulation itself is based on the, kinda sorta famous paper by Jos Stam 'Real-Time Fluid Dynamics for Games'
Here is more info: https://softologyblog.wordpress.com/2019/02/28/jos-stams-fluid-simulations-in-3d/

Pressure Passes are still bugged! Feel free to fix and comment
